item.description:
Les Trois Stoogiers, based on the satirical novel by Alexandre Dumass, is the story of 3 men who create a reality TV show to raise money to save their orphanage.

Hailed as a modern classic of the French school of cinema maladroit, Les Trois Stoogiers comes from the directors of Stupid et Stupidier and Quelque Chose a Propos de Marie.

We'll plan on meeting in the Showcase lobby at 6:45 for the 7:05 PM show on Tuesday, April 24. Showcase has $6 Tuesdays, so it's not a bad deal.

As usual, anyone who wants can join me for food, drinks, and socializing after the movie.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my photo, but with a goatee

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Les Trois Stoogiers
